body:
Thank you for enumerating the cases.  I will dig into this!

On Mon, Dec 18, 2017 at 1:06 PM Mike Cooper <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I've put a PR for this <https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/1154>.
> The schema I outlined above proved to be not quite realistic, so the actual
> schema implemented is slightly different. Specifically, isHighPop was
> replaced by experimentType, which takes the same value as experimentType
> in the main ping.
>
> This preview of the new documentation
> <https://github.com/mythmon/normandy/blob/32b3682772ca6e8f579e975d185cfdef91f45388/docs/user/data_collection.rst#enrollment>
> should be useful. @sunahsuh <https://github.com/sunahsuh>, @jaredkerim
> <https://github.com/jaredkerim>, @gregglind <https://github.com/gregglind>
> can you take a look at it? Does this meet your needs? I specifically tried
> to enumerate all the values of the enum-like fields for Gregg.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/issues/1139#issuecomment-352526767>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKAjx9QKowiGV0-WvuKPM1iYKzBg7Fcks5tBreggaJpZM4Qip7z>
> .
>
body_text:
Thank you for enumerating the cases.  I will dig into this!
…
On Mon, Dec 18, 2017 at 1:06 PM Mike Cooper ***@***.***> wrote:
 I've put a PR for this <#1154>.
 The schema I outlined above proved to be not quite realistic, so the actual
 schema implemented is slightly different. Specifically, isHighPop was
 replaced by experimentType, which takes the same value as experimentType
 in the main ping.

 This preview of the new documentation
 <https://github.com/mythmon/normandy/blob/32b3682772ca6e8f579e975d185cfdef91f45388/docs/user/data_collection.rst#enrollment>
 should be useful. @sunahsuh <https://github.com/sunahsuh>, @jaredkerim
 <https://github.com/jaredkerim>, @gregglind <https://github.com/gregglind>
 can you take a look at it? Does this meet your needs? I specifically tried
 to enumerate all the values of the enum-like fields for Gregg.

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#1139 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKAjx9QKowiGV0-WvuKPM1iYKzBg7Fcks5tBreggaJpZM4Qip7z>
 .
body_html:
Thank you for enumerating the cases. I will dig into this!
…
On Mon, Dec 18, 2017 at 1:06 PM Mike Cooper ***@***.***> wrote: I've put a PR for this <#1154>. The schema I outlined above proved to be not quite realistic, so the actual schema implemented is slightly different. Specifically, isHighPop was replaced by experimentType, which takes the same value as experimentType in the main ping. This preview of the new documentation <https://github.com/mythmon/normandy/blob/32b3682772ca6e8f579e975d185cfdef91f45388/docs/user/data_collection.rst#enrollment> should be useful. @sunahsuh <https://github.com/sunahsuh>, @jaredkerim <https://github.com/jaredkerim>, @gregglind <https://github.com/gregglind> can you take a look at it? Does this meet your needs? I specifically tried to enumerate all the values of the enum-like fields for Gregg. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#1139 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAKAjx9QKowiGV0-WvuKPM1iYKzBg7Fcks5tBreggaJpZM4Qip7z> .
